website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for beginning photographers and those new to DSLR, this user-friendly camera is the best budget model available.
cons: Some features lag behind its competitors

website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS Rebel T5 sports an attractive price tag, but you can get a better entry-level SLR for a little bit more money.

customer_reviews.title: Great for astrophotography
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to take pictures of space. I wasn't disappointed. A relatively inexpensive DSLR, and it still does absolutely everything I need. My only gripe is that the battery takes a long time to charge, and then doesn't last all that long. It's a refurbished camera, so maybe that's a factor. I also subject the poor thing to long periods of continuous use in cold outdoor temperatures, so take from that what you will. I will include some of my best photos taken with this camera - and with a bit of processing applied to them, of course. The images speak for themselves what this thing is capable of. Edit: more images
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera, its perfect. Best buy ever! (Those are the pictures I tooke with the camera)
customer_reviews.author: Leila J.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return but still giving a good review
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably, I had to send this one back because I received it damaged. It still worked and took nice photos but I didn't want a damaged unit for a new camera price. But it is a good camera that's a bit cheaper than the T6, which I bought after returning this. The principal differences in the two cameras are this one doesn't have WiFi (which in the T6 is practically useless anyway), it has a somewhat slower processor, and the LCD isn't quite as high a resolution. If you don't care about these features, this is an excellent value camera, and is very well reviewed on lots of photo sites.
customer_reviews.author: mark hepburnTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: This is my new toy! I have loved it. I am still learning it but have loved the pictures I have been able to get so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I need as a non professional photographer. It has a built in flash, a variable lens, every shooting mode that its professional sibling, the 6D, has. The quality of the photographs is fantastic. I use it to shoot my kids everywhere we go. The price for this digital camera is fantastic considering its features and quality. If you're not a professional, and you were planning on getting some 500 dollar plus camera, consider this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera as a gift and it is honestly so nice!! It takes awesome pictures and comes with a disc that you can put in your computer to touch up photos! Also takes great action shots with no blur. Such a great camera and easy to work! Comes with everything but an sd card and case but still very great and highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Odierno

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY 👍
customer_reviews.text: You're getting a great camera have had it for 2 weeks now. Amazing shots and once you get some practice in upgrade the lens and you'll be blown away. I'm pretty sure the lens will fit the t5i also so when you upgrade you'll have those lenses but don't quote me on that I'm still new to this. I'm happy I have a new hobby and can now take great picture on my family trips. All in all yes buy this over a Nikon the sensor is more advanced and can pick up light better from what my friend that's a pro photographer has told me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome entry-level DSLR. It works really well. If you already have this camera, there's a lens that is less expensive than the one Canon makes and is a really cool lens. It's a 1.8 aperature lens. It's fixed at 50mm. I have that lens and it works perfectly. I strongly suggest that you check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! I wanted a good camera to play around with but didn't want to spend a fortune . I am very happy with this camera. I go out and take pictures with my friend who has a much more expensive camera and the quality is very similar. Take the time to learn the camera and buy a good editing program- you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren32486

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever made
customer_reviews.text: Picked this thing up used with the kit lens about a month ago, mainly because I'm tired of looking at blurry cell phone pictures. I didn't plan on making this a hobby but I'm hooked. The pictures come out so clear its like your'e still there. All the settings are simple enough, it only took me a few hours to learn what everything does (this is my first dslr). I wouldn't recommend getting this for videos because of the lack of mic jack. As far a pictures go you wont find anything better for less then 300 bucks
customer_reviews.author: jimmy kutzer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful 18mp camera with a very good kit lens sold at a very reasonable price. The menu is intuitive and easy to navigate. The camera was well package and did manage to navigate shipping with no damage or loss. I purchased this body to use some very expensive Canon lenses that I have in my possession for awhile. It produces exceptional results with little or no effort. This confirms that I do not need a top of the line camera to produce very good results.
customer_reviews.author: Smeckatella

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to Europe and wanted a good professional camera to take good pictures. A phone can only do so much. I didn't want to spend $1000+ on a camera that I wouldn't know how to use anyway! So I brought this camera and the pictures were amazing! It's easy to use, small enough to carry in a big purse and the quality of pictures is fantastic. I highly recommend this camera to anyone that wants to take professional looking pictures without spending a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: This camera is super fun to photograph with!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Canon Rebel T5 a few days ago. This is a nice, solid little camera that has a long lasting battery life, takes great photos, and is easy to use once you get the feel of it. It does have some slight limitations, but overall is a nice camera. In the end this camera gets the job done. This camera also proves that you don't need the best camera to take excellent photos, which it's not. But combining great glass with this camera results in a winning combination. Also, even though its technology is slightly older, you can't beat its price point here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Boston guy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as an early birthday present. She has some photography ambitions but not a lot of professional experience and we found this, which has the potential to be very high-level (SLR so can switch out lenses and whatnot), but the auto settings allow her to take great pictures right now. She absolutely loves it and it takes awesome pictures. We bought a certified refurbished and honestly you wouldn't be able to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginner photographers, the default lense is not bad for most beginner applications though the f stop does not go as low as I would like. It auto focuses great and has a great battery life even with heavy use. Even moving fairly fast in a car you can still capture decently crisp photos if you play with the settings, but if that is not your thing then the default settings are pretty great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera. I was slightly hesitant to buy this because it was refurbished, but it came in brand new condition. Not a scratch or a ding on it. It is very user friendly. Still playing around with it, but have taken some excellent photos with it already. Has automatic settings, and manual settings for when you get more comfortable with the camera. I also bought a standard 50mm lens to go with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: McLaura

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for our upcoming trip. I figured I'd need an upgrade camera from my iPhone 5c. I was most concerned with this camera's performance in low light situations and it did very well. All photos attached we taken in VERY low light, two with flash and two without flash to give you a sense of how it performs (obviously better with flash). I still need to figure out how to optimize focus and zoom on this camera, so the lack of sharpness in the photos is most likely due to this. I definitely recommend this to someone who's looking for an upgrade but doesn't have $2k to shell out!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that is a little frustrating with this camera is getting pictures of moving objects. I've tried the "Moving" Mode when taking pictures, but they still come out fuzzy/out of focus. Other than that, the camera takes amazing photos. I've had many people come to my house and ask what professional has taken the pictures on my wall, and it is nice to say that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Laws

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller!  Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great! I'm no professional but I bought 2 of these to use in my photo booths and they are clear and easy to use. I don't carry them around or anything though, so I don't know how they are if you are walking or holding them by hand and taking pics. This was a great price and they sent me the T6 instead of the T5. Great deal and came new in the box with all the parts and instructions. Great Seller!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell it's refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I was worried but after receiving the camera and using it twice now I'm extremely happy I purchased this refurbished. Thank you Hedgehog Too and Amazon! The only issue I had is that I pressed the button to purchase without selecting the free accessory button which would have provide me a free memory card, camera bag, and tripod but that's my fault. Very happy with my purchase just in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great starter camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was chosen initially because it is the one I use at work. It is a great starter camera and I am very happy with how photos come out. So far I have used this taking pictures of landscape and portrait. I would say it works much better for things that are closer to you with the lens provided. I will be investing in a longer distance lens in the future. ...best photos are about 10 to 20 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Refurb!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement camera for my Canon EOS Rebel XSi. The refurb was just as described in new condition with all original accesories. I have used it several times since receiving it and have no issues. I love that it is a step up in MP. My only complaint about the body is that it does feel a little cheap compared to the heavier body of the XSi. But it is definitely lighter due to this. Overall I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING job by this company. The camera is in perfect shape, as is the lense. I may as well have ordered new. But I'm on a budget so this was 100% as good. Couldnt care less about having 3rd party batteries, because they're affordable enough I'll be able to have multiple. Not sure the condition this camera/lense was in before I recieved it but it literally seems like it's all brand spanking new. Great job guys!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly A.

customer_reviews.title: RAW Deal
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures with an improved focus and color control over my last Rebel Ti; but the Camera RAW images will not open in my Photoshop Elements (10) or Lightroom (4). I've had to resort to saving CS2 images as DNG (digital negatives). Works with CS4, I'm told; but I don't want to have to upgrade my editing software. I wish the camera manufacturers and Adobe would agree on a single RAW format that's interchangeable; but alas, no. Adobe created DNG to bridge the gap. It works but adds a step. Otherwise, a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons. Good value camera
customer_reviews.text: A great value dslr for beginners. Pro 1. Great value. Even better if you get T3 which I can't tell the difference. 2. Light and compact Con 1. Low resolution on LCD display. You might think it's something you can sacrifice for low $$ but it totally isn't! I'd much rather get refurbished T3 or T5 directly from canon. Right now refubished T5 is only 299. THATS CRAZY!
customer_reviews.author: Joe han

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great Price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, we just went on a cruise and I took over 1000 pictures! Nearly all of the pictures turned out great! The ones that didn't were mostly operator error or operator didn't read the instructions. Good price with lots of accessories. If you can live with having a camera that is not the top of the line, the latest and greatest, that takes awesome pics, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Canon never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and the options menu is also very easy to navigate to get the most out of the camera, lens as I would expect from Canon, wonderful. If you're an amateur in photography and you want to sophisticate yourself, this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: dplazas

customer_reviews.title: Love my new camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, but that I really LOVE this camera! I've owned it for some time now, but this isn't my first DSLR. I'm a hobbyist who needed to upgrade my Canon Rebel XS DSLR. This was definitely an upgrade for me, and I love it. The light sensitivity is slightly higher than the XS, but it's perfect for my needs. I'm a big fan of the stock lens because it's very versatile. I love the option for video (though I haven't used it yet). I think this is a perfect beginner or hobbyist DSLR. I got mine at a really great price, and I couldn't be happier about it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this from a third party and got the T6 but want to show as a "verified purchaser" and the cameras I believe are very similar. I love it and ordered a refurbished telephoto to go with it, super fun. I am a novice but this camera has inspired some great photos and I am delighted ith the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LE P. Seattle

customer_reviews.title: absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We were in desperate need of a good family camera so I made the decision to spend the money on this....and I haven't regretted it once! It's easy to use, and takes the most amazing photos! So many happy memories captured already :)
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. I thought it was a little too expensive but considering it came with battery pack, a carrying case and a memory card it was a great buy. I am not an experienced photographer but it doesn't matter because this camera took many amazing photos and videos. Will probably be upgrading the lens in the future but everyone complements me with amazing photographs
customer_reviews.author: Bre Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This camera works amazing! You dont need a super high-caliber camera if ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera works amazing! You dont need a super high-caliber camera if you need a good fair camera to do the trick. This camera can capture whatever you can get and what your wanting to afford, see for yourself for my shots. I have been mainly using it now for nature to test out the closeness of shallow depth of field. LOVE this camera, I assure you it wont be TOO much different then the T6 or T7. If you want super sharp images, the lenses is what does the magic more overall. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! It is pretty much ready to go out of the box. You do need a SD chip, but the camera is easy to use, takes great pics and offers lots of bells and whistles. It comes with software for photo shopping pics. Other models may have more software or options, this is a great starter or every day use camera. I have a zoom lens 55-200, which really works well with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, simple digital camera
customer_reviews.text: A good simple camera. Lots of features, not frills. Takes nice photos. I'm using this in a year-long outdoor time-lapse project. The camera is in a weather-proof box, it runs 18 hours a day, and it is working perfectly so far. I have lots of experience with T2i cameras, and Canon pro cameras (5D III, etc.). This one has all the basic features and none of the things I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my Mom who had a 35 mm rebel. This camera uses the same lenses she already had and that was a very important selling point. It it easy to use, relatively simple to use, but has many great features. I am happy I got it and my mom, is enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Perry

customer_reviews.title: Vendor gave us a free upgrade to a better product
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera and were happily surprised when the vendor upgraded our offer to a T6 without any additional charge. My son is so happy with his new camera!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rime

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera in “Very good” condition and it came in looking brand new! I love it and cannot wait to start using it. This is a great camera for beginners as it’s easy to use. Would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: A13williamson

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, even if you've never touched a camera in your life. Very nice for taking pics of my doggo.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is my first proper camera I bought for traveling and I love it. I don't mind that it doesn't have Wifi and it was relatively easy to learn all the features. It doesn't take up tons of space and the pictures come out quite clear. I attached some photos I recently took with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I like this however it was not WiFi compatible and for the price that was a bummer. But the pictures taken were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: D Bergh

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, from an amateur perspective
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy set up, and easy to follow instructions to get the most out of it. I have used the camera in a variety of settings and utilized all of the auto settings and they are all pretty great. The camera is relatively low weight as well so its easy to carry and keep at the ready. Battery life is solid too.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! I've tried out others
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR, and I love it! I've tried out others, and I think I prefer Canon. Great quality and straightforward enough to use. I got it in an amazon package deal with another lens, bag, and tripod. Great deal and value!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H.

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS Rebel T5 DLSR is a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera....reasonable price, light and convenient. I take beautiful photos nowadays and really help me with work-related assignments. I get a lot of compliments for beautiful shots taken. :) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a first DSLR Camera
customer_reviews.text: Price was right for this Refurbished item. Wanted the T5i, which has a rotating screen which is a plus if you record videos and want to see what you're recording, but solved that issue using the Canon Software included. All items in the box as if brand new. Love this camera and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. I've just started taking photos as a hobby and this camera is perfect. The pictures come out crisp and vibrant and the camera is easy to use. I need to learn how to utilize the different settings, but as a beginner this camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for intro or non-commercial photographers.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera for the price. I'm studying to be an art major and it takes quality pictures that work well with Photoshop. I recommend this for people looking for a gateway camera in to the photography world or as a quality option for the family album. I got it today and took it out for a test run and it was better than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera is a fantastic starter camera for the serious photographer
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a fantastic starter camera for the serious photographer. The increase in the quality of the pictures that I have taken with this camera is stunning. I highly recommend trying it out, especially since it is so much cheaper to other comparable cameras.
customer_reviews.author: bearclaw5

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I have a little experience with photography and decided that I wanted to do it more seriously, this camera is great for just that. After months of comparing cameras, and looking at reviews, I decided on this one. The price is good and the camer looked like a good starter camera. It was a great choice. The camera is a little difficult to understand at first but messing around with the settings for awhile really helped. Overall this camera is perfect for what I was looking for, good quality, and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera...Fast Shipment
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with this purchase! Great camera, amazing condition, fast Shipment, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: As good as you are
customer_reviews.text: My second T5, now both kids have one. T5i might be a better investment, depends on what you want it for.
customer_reviews.author: Valhalla Booksellers

customer_reviews.title: SLR Look and Feel
customer_reviews.text: I love how they have maintained the SLR look and adaptability. I bought this as a starter camera for my son and he loves the look and feel and looks forward to learning everything it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin E. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT come in orginal package.
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with an instruction manual but other than that the camera looked brand new (not a scratch to be found).
customer_reviews.author: R. Gager

customer_reviews.title: Good for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great amateur camera, seriously. Glad it's less expensive than the t3 no negligible features I miss. Though I now want a better camera but that's the problem for people who like to shoot night time scenes and stars or whatever. Will mention that the kit lens leaves wider apertures to be desired, but that's a $99 fix for the beginner (probably not that high a barrier to entry)
customer_reviews.author: Pragya Saxena

customer_reviews.title: T5 Canon kit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one ever since they were released... finally the price got right for me. I love this camera and have made som great pictures with it.... astounding really since I don't consider myself a pro by any stretch.
customer_reviews.author: John W Scoggins

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level camera. Came quickly and was packaged well. The camera itself is good quality and works perfectly for me as an aspiring photographer. After playing around with it for about two hours I've gotten a pretty good handle on manual mode. I love the handful of photos I've gotten from it so far. I'm very excited to take my photos to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera for Everyday or Special Use
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great camera! My husband and I used it on our honeymoon and were able to get some fantastic photos. I have been exposed to SLR cameras in the past but he has not, yet both of us found this camera to be exceptionally easy to use and care for. we purchased a package that came with a standard and a zoom lens--the best feature of the camera is how simple it is to navigate between the different lenses and camera settings. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Barebones feel, Nice entry level DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Not the best camera I have tested, but it does offer a decent entry level price for users not used to dslr cameras or users who want the bare minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arnold

customer_reviews.title: and my bad, assumed that it was
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware that it wasn't remote control compatible. No mention of remote control was made but it's so commonplace I, and my bad, assumed that it was. As a result, I'm going to use it as is and use the timer feature as a means to eliminate camera shake.Other than that, great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera on sale for Xmas and it was great. I had hope to take more pictures but haven't had the opportunity. I'll update with Photos that I have taken once I have the time to download them.
customer_reviews.author: That T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for beginners. This is my first DSLR & I love it. It takes great, clear pics; much better than the iphone! I still have to learn more about the functions, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for 14yo boy who has just started to fall in love with photography
customer_reviews.text: perfectly affordable first DSLR for child getting into photography. Lens is perfect for getting into this type of system and hopefully next year he'll be ready for something more complicated/sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: M. Horwath

customer_reviews.title: Good entry DSLR for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good entry DSLR for the price. But I would recommend the Canon SL1 over this T5. The SL1 is smaller, similar functions, but with touch screen and easier to work with control buttons and set up. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Lee

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital Camera! I have taken tons of photographs with it, and I am so happy that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent photos and one can purchase additional lenses and a flash to expand the photo taking possibilities. This camera was recommended to me and it is definitely as good as described.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of buying a camera though Amazon but ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying a camera though Amazon but it's worked wonders for me. You learn to appreciate life a bit more when your behind a lens.
customer_reviews.author: Yareline Merced

customer_reviews.title: This camera is very nice. It's simple and easy to use for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very nice. It's simple and easy to use for beginners. Unfortunately, the lens cover on mine did not stay on very well and was lost in a different country when it fell off. Other than the loose lens cover this camera works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera was in factory sealed box, it was delivered on time and works ands functions as expected. Very nice entry level camera. I am not happy with the fact that Canon decided this model didn't need wireless remote capability but considering what I paid for the camera i'm very happy. 2 thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: bclark59

customer_reviews.title: T5 Its a Canon!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. Been looking to buy this one for a while. Price dropped and came with a kit, what more do you want. Takes great pics. I haven't used much, I have a lot to learn though but looking forward to making great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Terrific, crisp images. Solid body but not too heavy. Easy to use workhorse. I upgraded from the kit lens when I ordered it. I mostly shoot landscape and wildlife photography, with a range of lenses. Wish I'd invested at this level of excellence sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jules, author

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Love the Rebel! I transitioned from 35mm to digital & was able to use my old lens on the new Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bought it used and got it in PERFECT condition - bought from TextbookRush
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! Check out my Instagram @BlotterMedia to see more pictures with this camera. I'll post a couple here!
customer_reviews.author: Blotter

customer_reviews.title: just wanted a good camera to take pictures of my baby with
customer_reviews.text: I'm no photographer, just wanted a good camera to take pictures of my baby with. The autofocus takes a while sometimes, but I'm not good enough/ steady enough to take pictures in focus without it, so I'm happy with the camera!
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for me as a Storm Chaser with limited ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera for me as a Storm Chaser with limited experience with a full function SLR camera. It does everything I want it to and provides an excellent platform to learn more advance camera settings and usage.
customer_reviews.author: charles hamilton

customer_reviews.title: My first DSLR
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR camera, and I'm loving it so far. I am still getting used to all the features and bought a beginners guide. It's light to carry, easy to operate, and user friendly with the guide and on screen guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: The seller was extremely helpful and I was very pleased to have the assistance
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my granddaughter and she loves it. Very much worth the fair price. The seller was extremely helpful and I was very pleased to have the assistance.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It will take some time to use all of the features, but have some great results already! Also, the lenses we had from a previous Canon rebel camera telephoto also work well with it, although they do not operate in the auto focus.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I only wish i had known the screen didn't pop out before.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Corsentino

customer_reviews.title: My daughter bought it for her photography class at school ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought it for her photography class at school.Camera didn’t work🤔😔 She took it in for teacher to see if she could fix but she couldn’t figure it out. We took it to camera store, they couldn’t figure it out, and suggested we take it to another camera store a half hour away. We decided to return it and are still waiting for the refund. Went ahead and bought one at Walmart for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wellinghurst

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The seller for this product is wonderful! Super helpful when the body I was sent was not functional properly and was very quick to help me with getting a new one. Much appreciated! The camera is beautiful and is perfect for new learners.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Huber

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera and delivered early. I highly recommend this camera for both amateurs and professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Student DSLR
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR. I got it because I am majoring in photography at school and wanted my own camera due to the hassles of renting. I love it. Been able to take some beautiful shots! Can't wait to bring it on vacation with me. I recommend this camera to anyone, especially students on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: I'm having a lot of fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for as a starter camera! Lens that is included is decent. It's more for portrait and close shots. Don't expect a powerful zoom. I'm having a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Giuda

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love It. Shoots 1080p. Uses Canon lenses. Can be used for broadcast quality HD video and hi-res photography. I do strongly recommend getting a Viewfinder Magnifier for shooting video.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this bad boy for my girlfriend for christmas. Came with the two lenses, bag, all I had to get was a memory card. She aboslutely loves it! Takes it everywhere, takes clear photos. I have the T2i myself and I love canon products.
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good camera. However
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good camera. However, the advance mechanism doesn't seem to work properly. The pixel richness and color were somewhat less than I'd hoped for a camera of this price range. I'm still getting familar with it, so, it might be an issue of practice.
customer_reviews.author: palisander_books

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought from Joeski Merchandise and I must say this was a brand new product all the way. I ordered on last week amd just got it today!! BRAND NEW!! cute turquoise carrying bag included with everything you need. Professional seller with professional products. I'm extremely satisfied amd will purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was told you can't go wrong with a Canon EOS Rebel. This is true. We have multiple people using this at work. Not everyone is a photographer and knows how to use all the features, so we leave it in auto mode, and it takes great pictures. Very please with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: r!der

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable camera at a great price. We bought and used this for our trip to Russia. The photos were amazing. Very easy to use, except the self timer. We still can't figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: aerin1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, as the days goes by I learn something new about this product. Great shots, video is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Super great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. It takes great pictures and has lots of features for the price. I've been a Canon fan for quite a while, and this one is no exception to their standards of quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. Using it for a color photography class
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. Using it for a color photography class, very versatile. I love "Light Painting" with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Lugo

customer_reviews.title: awsome 1st time DSLR I got great pics from my vegas visit https
customer_reviews.text: awsome 1st time DSLR I got great pics from my vegas visit [...]
customer_reviews.author: Alister

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for starting off photographers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for starting off photographers. It takes super good pictures and there's so many different things you can do
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martens

customer_reviews.title: perfect starter camera for the beginner and intermediate photographers
customer_reviews.text: perfect starter camera for the beginner and intermediate photographers. Bought this for my 13 year old daughter and she loves it, takes great videos as well
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love it most
customer_reviews.text: It is my first EOS camera. Even though it's the cheapest, I love it most. Great camera for beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera, I'm still teaching myself how to use it ... I'm not a professional or anything but yeah its been fun learning with it...
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. It is my first DSLR camera and I love using it everywhere. There's nothing bad to be said about it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Torres

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera, it takes amazing photos and is just amazing quality compared to what I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! The quality of the pictures are amazing and I love playing around with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but finding it easier to just take ...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, but finding it easier to just take pictures with my phone. Too much trouble to bring camera when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Victor O.

product_meta.title: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Kit with EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens
product_meta.description: Style:18-55mm| Configuration:BaseThe Canon EOS Rebel T5 SLR camera with the EF-S 18-55mm IS II standard zoom lens is perfect for families, budding photo enthusiasts and first-time SLR users alike. EOS Rebel T5 makes it easy to capture movies and photos that are nothing short of dazzling. It features a powerful 18 megapixel CMOS image sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor for easy recording of HD video and high-resolution photos and has a huge 3-inch LCD screen for Live View recording and review. With a 63-zone, dual-layer metering system, an expanded ISO range for outstanding operation in less-than-perfect light, shooting modes like Scene Intelligent Auto to take the guesswork out of complex shots plus creative options like Basic+ function and Creative Auto, the EOS Rebel T5 is ready for anything. With a helpful Feature Guide, rugged, lightweight construction and proven Canon design, the EOS Rebel T5 makes EOS SLR photography faster and easier than ever!
feature_bullets: 18 megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor with DIGIC 4 image processor
EF-S 18-55mm IS II standard zoom lens expands picture-taking possibilities
3-inch LCD TFT color, liquid-crystal monitor for easy viewing and sharing
EOS 1080p full HD movie mode helps you capture brilliant results
Features include continuous shooting up to 3fps, Scene Intelligent Auto mode, creative filers, built-in flash and feature guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars737 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
